name: show_datasink_request
short_doc: Show information about a data datasink.
doc: Shows information about a specified {data datasink}@{link /concepts/data_sinks/} or all data datasink.

fields.name: name
fields.doc: Name of the data sink for which to retrieve information. The name must refer to a currently existing data sink. If '*' is specified, information about all data sinks will be returned.
